name: Interactive meadow 64
description:
Hello there. I am puffy. I am you.  Welcome to our interactive meadow.  Stay a while. Relax and breath. Forget about anxiety. Forget about depression. Be your own best friend. 

Don't forget to say hi in the digital telepathy box below! 

Made for Flatgame Jam 2019 by Ellen Cunningham. 

Music by Komiku: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/
